TopicTitle: for how long u play KSP?

Articles.Content:
from 1.2

yes you can and probally i'm a new player

Since 0.2something, I think. Before Career Mode.

Edited June 3, 2019 by cubinator

Started with 0.90

Stopped at 1.3.1

1.4 pushed me away from it. The new parts were awesome and the fairings new colors beautiful, but the removal of the old parts annoyed me.  I tried to restart since, but each time there is a new major update or release (and I don't even know if my saves could still work with).
much longer than my steam account says i have. i have been here since 1.2.2 and have played (about maybe im guessing here) 500 hours give or take
I'll usually play for 2-3 hours at a time.....
I first bought the game on Christmas 2017, when the current version was 1.3.1. My first launch involved an explosion, because I didn’t check the staging
